page.title: 15MEDIA
page.content: Like most parts of England the City of Worcester is able to read the national daily newspapers which emanate from London. I refer to such papers as the Times,the Manchester Guardian,the Sun, the Star,the Daily Mail,the Express and the Daily Mirror.These particular groups produce Sunday papers as well. The people of Worcester can also buy the Birmingham Evening Mail,a daily, and the Sunday Mail by the same group, which is a weekly. Both give news of occurrences in the West Midlands.Local news for Worcester people is given in our local daily paper,the Evening News and the local weekly Berrows Journal. The Berrows Journal has the unique distinction of being the oldest current newspaper in Britain having been first printed in 1690. Items of local and national news are broadcast on the local radio station R.Wyvern.
